attributes.action: increase the State Pension and make it exempt from income tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People have been paying towards their retirement all of their working life, they have had no tax relief on their NI payments, yet the state pension is taxed as income, this should be stopped and the pension should  enough to keep pensioners out of poverty

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
